Effect contrast.

Allows to adjust the balance between the brightness of the effect and the brightness of the clock / running text displaying over effect.
Effect speed.

Higher value leads to increase the dynamic of effect.
Options to modify effect behavior
and/or representation
Длина пароля от 8 до 64 символов!: Length of password must be 8..64 chars!

Выключать индикатор при выключении устро: Turn off indicator with device off
Night clock. Click to turn off.
legend-info-5: text contains macros NOT related with date-time
legend-info-6: cell '0' is the control sequence text
common-1: Support 36 text lines, each line has index 0..9,A..Z
common-2: Macros is the sequence of control elements, each enclosed in curved brackets, for example '{Exx}'
common-3: If line with index 0 starts with '#' - text contains sequence of line indexes for display, for example '#1234ZYX'
common-4: If line with index 0 starts with '##' - texts will be displayed in random sequence
common-5: if line starts with '-' or empty or contains macros '{-}' - string is disabled and will not being shown
macros-01: in any place of text means that line is temporary disabled, same as '-' at the first char of text line
macros-02: in any place of text means that after text being displayed, next line for display is line with index N, where N - 1..9,A..Z
macros-03: if device supports  MP3 DFPlayer, play sound n from folder SD://03; If optional suffix '+' present, sound will be looped while text is displaying
macros-04: display text using effect XX as background, where XX is effect number. Effect will not be changed until text is displaying
macros-05: display text during specified amount of seconds S
macros-06: display text for specified repeat count X
macros-06a: If neither S nor N are not specified - text will be shown once. If both S and N macros are specified, only macros S will be used, macros N will be ignored.
macros-07: display twxt with specified color С; Color format is #RRGGBB. For example {C#45FA9A}
macros-08: display text over specified background color С; Color format is #RRGGBB;
macros-08a: Use macros {B#000000} for display text over black screen
macros-09: display current time as HH:MM in specified place of text.
macros-10: display current time using specified format F
macros-10a: Specifier F may contain following elements:
macros-10r2: - first char of noon specifier am/pm or AM/PM
macros-11: Weather condition: Clear, Cloudy, Rain and so on
macros-13_04: If no time specified - 00:00 will be used
macros-13_05: If event is in past time - instead of text containing this macros, the text with index N will be shown; where N is index as number 1..35 or letter of '1'..'9','A'..'Z'
macros-13_06: If no replacement text line is specified, text line with efent in past will not be shown
macros-13_12: It is recommended to limit time range using additional macros S, if year replacement chars are used in macros {R}
macros-14_03: - if no date is specified (set only time), that means "each day in specified time"
macros-14_04: - any component of date can be replaced with stars, that means "any"
macros-14_07: - each 1st day of any month of 2020 year
macros-14_11: If time is not specified, it means 00:00
macros-14_12: - text line index (1..9,A..Z or 1..35) which will be shown after event moment occurs
macros-14_13: - seconds BEFORE event moment, when text begin display on screen
macros-14_14: - seconds AFTER event moment, when replacement text will be displayed on the screen
macros-14_15: - day of week (1-mon..7-sun), when text line allowed to display
macros-14_16: Either date or time value must be specified mandatory. Other elements may be missed. In this case defaults will be used:
macros-14_17: - no replacement text line, if elements #N#B#A#W are not specified
macros-14_18: - seconds to show text BEFORE event - 60, if elements #B#A#W are not specified
macros-14_19: - seconds to show replacement text AFTER event - 60, if elements #A#W are not specified
macros-14_20: - limitations of weekdays is 1234567, if element #W is not specified
macros-14_21: Text line with macros {P} is not displaying regularly as texts with other macros. This text starts to display before #B to event. Next replacement text is displaying for #A seconds, After event occurs, if element #N is specified and text in line #N is not empty.
macros-14_22: If date is specified fully in exact manner and weekday also specified, but this date is not specified weekday - text will not being displayed.
macros-14_23: - if the last element of macros is #T - text will be shown at least once, next when rest of time before event is 60 seconds or less, the count down will be shown at the center of matrix
macros-14_24: - if the last element of macros is #t - the same as #T, but the rest of time in text is omitted
macros-14_25: - turn on countdown at the center of matrix before 60 seconds to event
macros-15_01: Is the time range allowed text to display, where:
macros-15_06: - date may not de specified, only time. This means "each day in specified time"
macros-15_07: - any date component may be replaced with stars '*', that means "any"
macros-15_10: - only one day 25 december 2020 year (all day from 0:00 to 23:59)
macros-15_14: - each year, in period from 1st to 12th of January and from 1st to 8th of April
warn_tx: Tx pin, not recommended, need disconnect from device during firmware upload. Set DEBUG_SERIAL to 0 (off) if use this pin. Output signals at moment od start device.
warn_rx: Rx pin, not recommended, need disconnect from device during firmware upload. Set DEBUG_SERIAL to 0 (off) if use this pin.
pull_high: Must be HIGH at boot, boot fails if pulled LOW.
pull_low: Must be LOW at boot, boot fails if pulled HIGH.
sd-card-info: SD card uses hardware SPI bus and can`t use other pins
dfplayer-info: On ESP32 DFPlayer uses hardware Serial2 port, player can`t use other pins.
wait_play_finished_info: If time of SD-card film greater than time of effect - wait until film is finished before effect changed
repeat_play_info: If time of SD-card film less than time of effect - repeat film until effect changed to next
Выводить журнал в монитор порта: Print debug info to Serial port
Менять эффект только после конца ролика: Change effect only after film finished
Повторять короткие ролики до смены эффек: Loop short film until effect running
matrix_warning: Changing size of matrix may require change length of led-segment line in section 'Setup' - 'Wiring', otherwise image on matrix will not be display fully, only partially.
sync_warning: Master mode unavailable for matrix with LEDs amount greater than 2040
